Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: By means of the simultaneous recording of interrelated peripheral and central electrophysiologic correlates of nociception , it was possible to separate central and peripheral effects of an NSAID .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Nociception |

In this paragraph, the term "nociception" is used to refer to the physiological process by which the nervous system recognizes and responds to potential tissue damage. It is not a disease per se, but rather a physiological response to potential harm. Therefore, it is the only valid entity in this paragraph that can be identified as related to a disease or health condition.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Nociception |

In this paragraph, only the term "nociception" can be identified as referring to a health condition or disease-related process. Therefore, it is the only valid entity to include in the table.
